ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدْ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'By Allah, Allah has favoured you above us. Clearly we were in the wrong.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "By God, God has favoured you above us, for we have indeed been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "We swear by Allah! Indeed Allah has chosen you in preference to us and we were truly guilty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "We swear by God that He has given preference to you over us and we have sinned".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “By Allah, undoubtedly Allah has given you superiority over us, and we were indeed guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "By Allah! Indeed Allah has preferred you above us, and we certainly have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: By Allah! now has Allah certainly chosen you over us, and we were certainly sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By God,' they said, 'God has indeed preferred thee above us, and certainly we have been sinful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: By Allah, verily Allah hath preferred thee above us, and we were indeed sinful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [The brothers] said, "By God! Most certainly God has raised you high above us, and we have indeed been guilty!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: by Allah! assuredly Allah hath chosen thee above us, and we have been sinners indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘By Allah, Allah has certainly preferred you over us, and we have indeed been erring.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "By Allah! indeed has Allah preferred thee above us, and we certainly have been guilty of sin!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "By Allah! Indeed Allah has preferred you above us, and we certainly have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By Allah' they said, 'Allah has preferred you above us all. We have indeed been sinful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “By God, God has preferred you over us. We were definitely in the wrong.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "By Allah, certainly has Allah preferred you over us, and indeed, we have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:91] They said, ‘By God, truly God has preferred you over us, with kingship and in other ways, and indeed we (wa-in: in is softened, in other words [it is understood as] innā, ‘indeed we’) have been erring’, sinful towards you and treated you disgracefully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) Joseph's brothers said to Joseph: (By Allah, verily Allah hath preferred you above us, and we were indeed sinful) towards you, and disobedient of Allah..
